definition.name: Collapsible
definition.description: A component that wraps collapsible content and manages its expanded/collapsed state. This is the root component that provides context for the collapsible functionality.

open.description: The controlled open state of the collapsible

defaultOpen.description: The default open state when initially rendered

onOpenChange.description: Event handler called when the open state changes

disabled.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the collapsible

definition.name: CollapsibleTrigger
definition.description: The button that toggles the collapsible content. This component must be rendered inside a Collapsible component and controls its expanded/collapsed state.

asChild.description: Change the component to the HTML tag or component of your choice

definition.name: CollapsibleContent
definition.description: The component that contains the collapsible content. This component must be rendered inside a Collapsible component and will be shown/hidden based on the expanded/collapsed state.

asChild.description: Change the component to the HTML tag or component of your choice

forceMount.description: Used to force mounting when more control is needed. Useful when controlling animation with React animation libraries.
